info.name: The Pirate Bay Monokai
info.description: Based on the popular Monokai color scheme used in text editors, this theme will give TPB a whole new look and feel. Easier on the eyes and overall prettier than the default color scheme. THIS STYLE WILL WORK REGARDLESS OF THE DOMAIN REGION (.se, .cr, .la, etc.)
info.additionalInfo:
Important: I wrote this in conjunction with an efficient adblocker. If you don't use adblock in TPB, it might not look like it does in the screenshots.

MAR 7, 2016
- Initial release
